勥字的基本解释

勥
jiàng
同“犟”。

勥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiǎng］
［《廣韻》其兩切，上養，羣。］
［《廣韻》巨良切，平陽，羣。］
强迫；勉强。
[②]［jiàng］
［《廣韻》其兩切，上養，羣。］
［《廣韻》巨良切，平陽，羣。］
倔强，固执。

勥字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【力字部】　勥； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页149第08
【唐韻】其兩切【集韻】巨兩切，?强上聲。【說文】迫也。【廣韻】追也，勉力也。又【集韻】渠良切，音强。義同。又【集韻】舉兩切，音繦。㔝勥，力拒也。

勥字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
勥字的起名意思

暂无。

勥
Basic explanation of words
勥
jiàng
Same as "犟".
勥
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiǎng］
["Guangyun" has two cuts, upper support, group. ]
["Guangyun" Ju Liangqie, Pingyang, Qun. ]
Forced; reluctantly.
[②]［jiàng］
["Guangyun" has two cuts, upper support, group. ]
["Guangyun" Ju Liangqie, Pingyang, Qun. ]
Stubborn and stubborn.
勥
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Li Zi Department] 　勥; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 149-08
【Tang Yun】Its two cuts [Ji Yun] is a huge two cuts, strong voice. [Said the text] forced also. [Guang Yun] Chasing and trying hard. Also [Jiyun] Qu Liang cuts, the sound is strong. The same meaning. Also 【Jiyun】Take two cuts, Yin Zhen.㔝勥, I can't resist.
